attributes.additional_details: Stop allowing social services to force are children in to adoption from a loving family I spent 4 months in a mother and baby unit all for them to sit writing up there reports on lies I was wrongly arrested for trying to stop social services taking away my child he's only 5 months old he needs his mummy not to be adopted out to some stranger who can't have a child of there own this needs to stop

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635578
